about.lead: Andrew is a Texas-based voice actor delivering polished reads for commercials, trailers, games, and corporate narration. Fast turnaround and pristine audio.

projects.title: Ad Spot — Acme Outdoors
projects.desc: 30s commercial voiceover with upbeat, conversational tone.

projects.title: Narration — Skyline Expo
projects.desc: 2-minute event teaser narration. Clear, confident delivery.

projects.title: Character Reel
projects.desc: Compilation of character voices for animation and games.
